pages.title: Kinematic Components
pages.text: Overview $(br2)Kinematic variants of Servo Motors/Physical Pistons.$(br)Powerful but unsafe.
Interaction $(br2)$(li)Sneak + Right Click to assemble blocks above (glue not supported).$(li)Use a wrench to adjust orientation.

pages.title: Control Panel
pages.text: Right Click with an empty hand to open the control panel.
Main Panel $(br2)Displays:$(br2)Current: Relative angle/angular velocity or position/velocity (radians/radians per second or blocks/blocks per second).$(br2)Target: Desired angle/angular velocity.
Main Panel $(br2)Compliance: Stops updating constraints when error falls below 1e-5 (default log value: -5).
Main Panel $(br2)Mode: Angle or Angular Velocity.
Redstone Panel $(br2)Configurable parameter: Target value (supports multiple inputs with min/max settings).$(br) See general redstone panel documentation.

Warnings $(br2)Kinematic machines ignore physics, which has consequences:$(li)Avoid destroying connected structures without disassemblyâ€”this may crash the physics thread.$(li)Strong recoil requires the base to be static or massive to prevent oscillations.
